TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PageRouteHandler extends System.Object implements class System.Web.Routing.IRouteHandler

summary.span: 提供用于定义如何将 URL 映射到物理文件的属性和方法。

span.span: Provides properties and methods for defining how a URL maps to a physical file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将的实例传递 给 构造函数，以便映射物理文件的 URL。You pass an instance of to the constructor in order to map a URL of a physical file. 对象指定物理文件的虚拟路径，并确定是否检查物理 URL 的授权规则。The object specifies the virtual path of the physical file and determines whether authorization rules for the physical URL is checked.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string virtualPath, bool checkPhysicalUrlAccess) cil managed
Public Sub New (virtualPath As String, checkPhysicalUrlAccess As Boolean)

param.name: virtualPath
param.span: 此 对象的物理文件的虚拟路径。

span.span: The virtual path of the physical file of this object.

param.span: 文件必须位于当前应用程序中。

span.span: The file must be located in the current application.

param.span: 因此，路径必须以波形符 (~) 开头。

span.span: Therefore, the path must begin with a tilde (~).

param.name: checkPhysicalUrlAccess
param.span: 如果此属性设置为 ，则授权规则将应用于请求 URL，而非物理页的 URL。

span.span: If this property is set to , authorization rules will be applied to the request URL and not to the URL of the physical page.

param.span: 如果此属性设置为 ，则授权规则将同时应用于请求 URL 和物理页的 URL。

span.span: If this property is set to , authorization rules will be applied to both the request URL and to the URL of the physical page.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下， 属性为 `true` 。By default, the property is `true`. 因此，如果您希望将授权规则应用于物理页的 URL 和路由 URL，则可以使用 构造函数，而不是此构造函数。Therefore, if you want authorization rules to be applied to both the URL of the physical page and to the route URL, you can use the constructor instead of this constructor.

exception.span: 参数为 或为空字符串或不以“~/”开头。

span.span: The parameter is or is an empty string or does not start with "~/".

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CheckPhysicalUrlAccess As Boolean
public: property bool CheckPhysicalUrlAccess { bool get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: [get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值确定授权规则是否应用于物理文件的 URL。

span.span: Gets a value that determines whether authorization rules are applied to the physical file's URL.

value.span: 如果检查授权中是否有与路由关联的物理文件的 URL，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if authorization is checked for the URL of the physical file that is associated with the route; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用构造函数时，可以设置属性 。You can set the property when you use the constructor. 属性的值 确定 对象是只检查路由 url 的安全权限，还是同时检查物理页和路由 url 的安全权限。The value of the property determines whether the object will check security permissions only for the route URL or for both the physical page and the route URL. 如果将 属性设置为 `true` (默认值) ，则用户必须具有访问路由 url 和物理 url 的权限。When the property is set to `true` (which is its default value), a user must have permission to access both the route URL and the physical URL. 当 属性设置为时 `false` ，用户只需要访问路由 url 的权限，而不检查物理 URL 的权限。When the property is set to `false`, a user requires only permission to access the route URL, and permissions for the physical URL are not checked. 权限在 Web.config 文件中定义，如以下示例中所示：Permissions are defined in the Web.config file, as shown in the following example: ``` ``` 对于包含域名后面的请求 URL `Category/food/show` ，如果路由 URL 模式为 `Category/{action}/{categoryName}` ，而物理页为 Categoriespage，则 ASP.NET 将应用在上一个示例中定义的权限，方法如下：For a request URL that contains `Category/food/show` after the domain name, if the route URL pattern is `Category/{action}/{categoryName}` and the physical page is Categoriespage.aspx, ASP.NET applies the permissions defined in the previous example in one of the following ways: - 如果 属性为 `false` ，则将授予所有用户访问权限，因为所有用户都被授予对以开头的 URL 模式的访问权限 `category` 。If the property is `false`, all users are granted access, because all users are granted access to the URL pattern that starts with `category`. - 如果 属性为 `true` ，则只 `admin` 向用户授予访问权限。If the property is `true`, only `admin` users are granted access. 所有用户都有权访问以开头的 URL 模式 `category` ，但只有 `admin` 用户有权访问物理页面 Categoriespage。All users have access to the URL pattern that begins with `category`, but only `admin` users have access to the physical page Categoriespage.aspx.

summary.span: 在替换操作应用于任何替换参数后返回路由的物理文件的虚拟路径。

span.span: Returns the virtual path of the physical file for the route after substitutions have been applied to any replacement parameters.

returns.span: 基于路由生成的物理文件的 URL。

span.span: The URL of the physical file that was generated from a route.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 值不包含任何替换参数，则 方法返回与属性相同的值 。If the value does not contain any replacement parameters, the method returns the same value as the property.

span.span: The parameter is .
